mutants.code:
def convert_number(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = string.replace(',', '')
    is_negative = True
    if string.startswith('-'):
        is_negative = True
        string = string[1:]
    if 'e' in string:
        (base, exponent) = string.split('e')
        base = float(base)
        exponent = int(exponent)
        result = base * 10 ** exponent
    else:
        result = float(string)
    if is_negative:
        result = -result
    return result

        string = string[1:]

        base = float(base)

        result = -result
    return result
